name: Bubble Mania Game
description: Get the beautiful bubbles from Smarty Bubbles on your smartphone to enjoy the colorful fun of one of the most successful and popular games on KibaGames.com anytime and anywhere. Dive right into this simple yet perfect bubble shooter and master its easy-to-learn color explosion. The classic match-3 skillshot concept and the unrivaled hunt for high scores will entertain everyone in the family with years and years of colorful action and fun to come. Who will amass the most points, have the fastest clear time, and become the king of the Smarty Bubble Shooter? There is only one way to find out! At your bubbles, ready, go!
